lead_paragraph: RUDYK--Andrew, 69, died suddenly on May 17, 2016. The family will be receiving friends at Preston Funeral Home, 153 South Orange Ave, South Orange, NJ on Sunday, June 26th from 2:00-2:45pm followed by a Memorial Service. Born in Koblenz, Germany he has lived in Maplewood, NJ for many years. He served in the United States Army, from 1971-1973. He graduated from City College and New York Law School. He was a college professor at John Jay College of Criminal Justice in New York City for many years. He is survived by his beloved wife of Irene Winicov. 1/3
